metadata.title: DPM/FM Dar, Egyptian FM strongly condemn Israeli unprovoked illegal strikes on Doha

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Sep 13 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Saturday received a phone call from Egypt's Foreign Minister Dr. Badr Abdelatty. "Both leaders strongly condemned the Israeli unprovoked illegal strikes on Doha and discussed the modalities and details of the forthcoming OIC Council of Foreign Ministers in Doha, scheduled for Sunday, 14 September," Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release.
